sentences.sContent: Why should anyone want to marry Tony?
sentences.sCn: 怎么竟然会有人意嫁给托尼？

sentences.sContent: ...it is crucial that the government should encourage people to pursue overseas study...
...Also it is crucial that people should understand the meaning and value of humanities...

...Funding agencies note that data paid for with public money should be public information and the scientific community is recognizing that data can now be shared digitally in ways that were not possible before...
...it is crucial that modern education should encourage people to be wise meditators rather than mad scientists...
...You should decide on the best choice and mark the corresponding letter on Answer Sheet 2with a single line through the centre...
...every country’s carbon pricing should reflect not only the purely domestic damage from emissions...
...it is crucial that modern education should encourage people to be practitioners rather than pedants...
...Also it is crucial that people should understand the meaning and value of scientific knowledge...
...Also it is crucial that people should understand the meaning and value of attending college abroad...
...The author attributes his tech addiction chiefly to his habit of putting off doing what he should 45...

phrases.pCn: 我该怎么办；我应该做些什么

trans.tranOther: used to say what is the right or sensible thing to do
